verses.verse: And Abram<WH87> went up<WH5927> out of Egypt,<WH4480> <WH4714> he,<WH1931> and his wife,<WH802> and all<WH3605> that<WH834> he had, and Lot<WH3876> with<WH5973> him, into the south.<WH5045>
And Abram<WH87> was very<WH3966> rich<WH3515> in cattle,<WH4735> in silver,<WH3701> and in gold.<WH2091>

And he went<WH1980> on his journeys<WH4550> from the south<WH4480> <WH5045> even to<WH5704> Bethel,<WH1008> unto<WH5704> the place<WH4725> where<WH834> <WH8033> his tent<WH168> had been<WH1961> at the beginning,<WH8462> between<WH996> Bethel<WH1008> and Hai;<WH5857>

Unto <WH413> the place<WH4725> of the altar,<WH4196> which<WH834> he had made<WH6213> there<WH8033> at the first:<WH7223> and there<WH8033> Abram<WH87> called<WH7121> on the name<WH8034> of the LORD.<WH3068>
And Lot<WH3876> also,<WH1571> which went<WH1980> with<WH854> Abram,<WH87> had<WH1961> flocks,<WH6629> and herds,<WH1241> and tents.<WH168>

And the land<WH776> was not<WH3808> able to bear<WH5375> them, that they might dwell<WH3427> together:<WH3162> for<WH3588> their substance<WH7399> was<WH1961> great,<WH7227> so that they could<WH3201> not<WH3808> dwell<WH3427> together.<WH3162>

And there was<WH1961> a strife<WH7379> between<WH996> the herdsmen<WH7462> of Abram's<WH87> cattle<WH4735> and the herdsmen<WH7462> of Lot's<WH3876> cattle:<WH4735> and the Canaanite<WH3669> and the Perizzite<WH6522> dwelled<WH3427> then<WH227> in the land.<WH776>

And Abram<WH87> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Lot,<WH3876> Let there be<WH1961> no<WH408> strife,<WH4808> I pray thee,<WH4994> between<WH996> me and thee, and between<WH996> my herdsmen<WH7462> and thy herdsmen;<WH7462> for<WH3588> we<WH587> be brethren.<WH251>

Is not<WH3808> the whole<WH3605> land<WH776> before<WH6440> thee? separate thyself,<WH6504> I pray thee,<WH4994> from<WH4480> <WH5921> me: if<WH518> thou wilt take the left hand,<WH8040> then I will go to the right;<WH3231> or if<WH518> thou depart to the right hand,<WH3225> then I will go to the left.<WH8041>

And Lot<WH3876> lifted up<WH5375> <WH853> his eyes,<WH5869> and beheld<WH7200> <WH853> all<WH3605> the plain<WH3603> of Jordan,<WH3383> that<WH3588> it was well watered<WH4945> every where,<WH3605> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> destroyed<WH7843> <WH853> Sodom<WH5467> and Gomorrah,<WH6017> even as the garden<WH1588> of the LORD,<WH3068> like the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> as thou comest<WH935> unto Zoar.<WH6820>

Then Lot<WH3876> chose<WH977> him<WH853> all<WH3605> the plain<WH3603> of Jordan;<WH3383> and Lot<WH3876> journeyed<WH5265> east:<WH4480> <WH6924> and they separated themselves<WH6504> the one<WH376> from<WH4480> <WH5921> the other.<WH251>

Abram <WH87> dwelled<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> and Lot<WH3876> dwelled<WH3427> in the cities<WH5892> of the plain,<WH3603> and pitched his tent<WH167> toward<WH5704> Sodom.<WH5467>
But the men<WH376> of Sodom<WH5467> were wicked<WH7451> and sinners<WH2400> before the LORD<WH3068> exceedingly.<WH3966>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Abram,<WH87> after that<WH310> Lot<WH3876> was separated<WH6504> from<WH4480> <WH5973> him, Lift up<WH5375> now<WH4994> thine eyes,<WH5869> and look<WH7200> from<WH4480> the place<WH4725> where<WH834> <WH8033> thou<WH859> art northward,<WH6828> and southward,<WH5045> and eastward,<WH6924> and westward: <WH3220>
For <WH3588> <WH853> all<WH3605> the land<WH776> which<WH834> thou<WH859> seest,<WH7200> to thee will I give<WH5414> it, and to thy seed<WH2233> forever.<WH5704> <WH5769>

And I will make<WH7760> <WH853> thy seed<WH2233> as the dust<WH6083> of the earth:<WH776> so that<WH834> if<WH518> a man<WH376> can<WH3201> number<WH4487> <WH853> the dust<WH6083> of the earth,<WH776> then shall thy seed<WH2233> also<WH1571> be numbered.<WH4487>
Arise, <WH6965> walk<WH1980> through the land<WH776> in the length<WH753> of it and in the breadth<WH7341> of it; for<WH3588> I will give<WH5414> it unto thee.

Then Abram<WH87> removed his tent,<WH167> and came<WH935> and dwelt<WH3427> in the plain<WH436> of Mamre,<WH4471> which<WH834> is in Hebron,<WH2275> and built<WH1129> there<WH8033> an altar<WH4196> unto the LORD.<WH3068>
